links.description: MICHAEL KRAMER AND THE CLIENTS OF MOTT CAPITAL OWN SHARES OF NFLX The coming week will be a big week when it comes to data, with inflation and jobs data starting on Wednesday. First, we get ADP private jobs data, with consensus looking for 186,000 jobs created in May, and then 1Q GDP comes later that morning with consensus calling for growth of 2.3 percent.
